description: This tool presents the protocol and standard operating procedures (SOPs) for the collection of data on cardiometabolic, respiratory and neurodevelopment/mental health outcomes, exposures, and biological samples collection for the follow-up of the HELIX cohort into adolescence. This tool is for researchers looking for guidance on cohort data collection protocols aimed at adolescents.
name: Protocol and SOPs for exposure data, health outcome data, biosamples in adolescents (HELIX cohort)
